LanguageData.VCEUE_StartCuringInsertionDesc: Begin curing plasteel in the autoclave
LanguageData.VCEUE_CancelCuringDesc: Cancel curing plasteel in the autoclave.
LanguageData.VCEUE_CuringFailurePower: The curing process has failed due to a lack of power in the autoclave
LanguageData.VCEUE_CuringFailurePowerWarning: The curing process is in danger of failing due to a lack of power in the autoclave
LanguageData.VCEUE_FinishedCuring: The plasteel has finished a simple curing process and is ready for retrieval
LanguageData.VCEUE_StartWeavingInsertionDesc: Begin weaving a thread of your choice in the autoweave
LanguageData.VCEUE_CancelWeavingDesc: Cancel weaving a thread of your choice in the autoweave.
LanguageData.VCEUE_WeavingFailurePower: The weaving process has failed due to a lack of power in the autoweave
LanguageData.VCEUE_WeavingFailurePowerWarning: The weaving process is in danger of failing due to a lack of power in the autoweave
LanguageData.VCEUE_FinishedWeaving: The autoweave has finished weaving a thread of your choice and is ready for retrieval
